Department of Social & Cultural Analysis Facebook

Facebook page for the Department of Social and Cultural Analysis (SCA). Includes departments such as Africana Studies, American Studies, Asian/Pacific/American Studies, Gender & Sexuality Studies, Latino Studies, and Metropolitan Studies. The Facebook page features colloquiums, lectures, course descriptions, film screenings, and other events.
